name: CHRISTMAS GIFT CARD OFFER *** £210 / 10 Hours ***
description:
Buy a 10 hour Gift Card at a DISCOUNTED price to the current 2013 prices before the end of December and save £££'s in 2014.

Each Gift Card costs £210 (normally £220) and gives you 10 hour of driving lessons. Buy as many Gift Cards as you wish to save more against the 2014 prices.

To redeem your Gift Card Lessons, simply contact me to book the lessons when you are ready to take them. Book in your lessons at the next available date and away we go ... Gift cards will be posted out to your address. These are ideal Christmas gifts so buy them early to have them delivered before Christmas.

T+C's 
For use on the DERBY test centre routes.
Valid only for 6 months from purchase date.
Driving Lessons are subject to availability.
Offer is non-transferable.
Gift Cards must be shown on the 1st Lesson as proof of payment.

name: BLOCK BOOKED Driving Lessons (£220 for 10 Hrs) 2013 price
description:
£220 gets you 10 Hours of lessons. (2013 rates available to drivers TAKING lessons before Dec 31st 2013)

These lessons will usually be taken in 2 Hour slots.

These are standard lessons and suit all levels of experience.
To claim your lessons, Call 07883952169 with your payment confirmation.

Derby (Sinfin) Test centre - CALL FOR DETAILS

name: Assessment Session (£50 for a 2 Hr)
description:
£50 will get you a 2 hour Assessment session.

We will discuss your needs, what level of experience you are at and what I feel is the best follow up action after the day.

On this 2 hour session, depending on your level of experience, we will cover as many seperate elements of the DSA driving test as possible.

This Assessment Session is ideal for someone wanting to take up driving after a long break from behind the wheel or someone wanting to sharpen up a few individual skills.

Derby Sinfin Test centre - 

CALL FOR DETAILS

name: Intensive Driving course (Daily rates discount)
description:
£150 gets you a full day behind the wheel. 
There will be a minimum of 6 hours/day spent on driving and or driver training.

These sessions are ideal for someone wants to pass their Practical Driving Test in a shorter space of time.

Derby Sinfin Test centre - CALL FOR DETAILS

Discounts available for multiple days , See drop down menu below

For full details of the Intensive driving course, Please call 07883952169.

name: PASS PLUS
description:
£200 gets you a minimum of 6 hours worth of extra lessons after you have passed your driving test.

These lessons can be taken in 2 Hour slots, or together in longer sessions if required.

These lessons cover MOTORWAY DRIVING, TOWN CENTRE DRIVING, ROUNDABOUTS, COUNTRYSIDE, ALL WEATHER AND NIGHT TIME DRIVING.

There is no test at the end of the course. There is an extra charge of £25/hr for subjects have not been covered to a satisfactory level.

CALL FOR DETAILS
